sub_title: Utility Mapping | TerraCarta | Digital Underground SG | DUConnect | COB
summary:
Rob believes in creating and maintaining high-quality, reliable 3D data of underground utilities. He helps government authorities and large companies around the world to create digital representations of these assets for planning, designing, safe digging, and asset management.

Rob led the Digital Underground project in Singapore from 2018 to 2022. He co-founded the DUConnect community to bring together professionals in the utility mapping industry to share best practices.

Currently, Rob works for TerraCarta, a Dutch utility mapping company. He coordinates efforts to establish a national database for sharing information about trial trenches on behalf of the Centre for Underground Construction (COB) in The Netherlands. He also works as a consultant for the Digital Underground project in Singapore.
